name: Ultimate Mini Warrior VS Crazy Minotaur in Dungeon Madness
name_original: Ultimate Mini Warrior VS Crazy Minotaur in Dungeon Madness
description:
The battle between the ultimate mini warrior and the crazy minotaurs has begun!!! Lots of minotaurs are rampaging and destroying the town. It is my duty as the warrior to purge them.
These monsters mostly live in dungeon that is why I am here to get rid all of them .

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Tap to release the warrior run to kill the minotaur.

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Simple play
- 3D platform game
- Great scene , Character models , Cartoon FX.
